ZN isn't impervious to the GFW. One thing you could do is be a TOR relay.  But the main problem for Chinese users would be reaching that first gateway.  

I don't know for certain, but you could see if maybe an SSH tunnel might last longer than just a VPN.  Just guessing here though.
